document.full_text: a researcher culling through civil war-era documents at the national archives has identified nearly 3,000 letters and papers written by one of america's greatest poets -- walt whitman -- when he worked as a government clerk, officials said on tuesday.
document.title: trove of walt whitman writings found in u.s. archives
lines_and_colors: a researcher culling through civil war-era documents at the national archives has identified nearly 3,000 letters and papers written by one of america's greatest poets -- walt whitman -- when he worked as a government clerk, officials said on tuesday.
